findings.title: FUND_ADDRESS can mint tokens to FUND_ADDRESS
findings.description: The contract allows FUND_ADDRESS to mint tokens to itself.

findings.title: POLICY can call rebalance function and mint to SWAN_LAKE tokens
findings.description: The POLICY role has the privilege to call the rebalance function and mint tokens to SWAN_LAKE.

findings.title: FOUNDER_ONE and FOUNDER_TWO can claim dividends
findings.description: The BlackSwanERC20 contract has a function claimFounderDividend() that updates founderOneLastClaim or founderTwoLastClaim variables only when minting them tokens more or equal to founderOneMonthlyClaim value.

findings.title: Owner can swap SWAN to USDC
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to swap SWAN tokens to USDC.

findings.title: Owner can provide liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to provide liquidity.

findings.title: ORCHESTRATOR can initiate rebalance
findings.description: The ORCHESTRATOR has the privilege to initiate a rebalance function.

findings.title: Owner can change liquidity target
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the liquidity target in the BlackSwanPolicy contract.

findings.title: Owner can change liquidity fund percentage
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the liquidity fund percentage.

findings.title: Owner can change last completed migration
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the last completed migration.

findings.title: Owner can transfer token on any address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to transfer tokens to any address without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change rewards per block value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the rewards per block value in the BasePool contract.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw all fees to owner address
findings.description: The contract allows the owner to withdraw all fees to their own address.

findings.title: Inconsistent Variable Updates in claimFounderDividend() Function
findings.description: The claimFounderDividend() function updates founderOneLastClaim or founderTwoLastClaim variables only when minting tokens more or equal to founderOneMonthlyClaim value, which may lead to inconsistent state.

findings.title: getData() function may be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if todayDatas list is too long
findings.description: The getData() function uses a loop for calculations and may be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the todayDatas list is too long.
